thread.title: Beware of slow moving traffic on these UAE roads
thread.title_full: Beware of slow moving traffic on these UAE roads

title: Beware of slow moving traffic on these UAE roads
text: Beware of slow moving traffic on these UAE roads Web Report Filed on February 7, 2017 Share Traffic jam reported on Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Road. Morning rush on Tuesday morning slowed down traffic on main Dubai and Sharjah roads. According to Google Maps, slow traffic movement was observed on certain sections of Dubai's Sheikh Zayed Road, including around Safa Park and Business Bay. The usual traffic jam was reported on Sharjah's Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Road towards Dubai. Motorists are advised to follow road safety rules and take alternate routes where possible. Share
